DataElement.preferredName: Patient Informed Consent Age Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The status of eligibility verification for the patient's age at the time of informed consent as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Informed Consent Age Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved._How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth._Having been established or verified._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Informed Consent Age Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.:How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.:Having been established or verified.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.
How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient is >/= 18 years of ag
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is >/= 18 years of age on the day of signing informed consent.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is greater than or equal to 18 years of age and less than or equal to 39 on the day of signing informed consent.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is greater than or equal to 18 years of age and less than or equal to 39 at registration.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient must be greater than or equal to 18 years and less than or equal to 39 years of age at registration.
